department: Correctional Service of Canada Service correctionnel du Canada
short_summary: Vocational Safety Training H2S Alive and Confined Space Training
description: The Correctional Service of Canada has a requirement to provide vocational safety training with third party certification in H2S Alive and Confined Space training programs, on an as and when requested basis, to groups of offenders at the Pæ Sakæstw Centre in Maskwacis Alberta. Objective: To provide vocational safety training with third party certification, on an as and when requested basis, to offenders at the Pæ Sakæstw Centre in Maskwacis Alberta. The Contractor must provide certified resource(s) to deliver safety training sessions for H2S Alive and Confined Space training...
duration_in_months: You must demonstrate on your cover letter that the schedule of classes that you will be teaching will cover all dates between November 2023 and November 30, 2025.
tags: Pæ Sakæstw Centre in Maskwacis Alberta
